channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The Latest: Trump and Harris head back to Pennsylvania, the largest battleground state
item.description: Democrat Kamala Harris and Republican Donald Trump are taking their presidential campaigns back to Pennsylvania.

item.title: Texas driver is killed and two deputies are wounded during Missouri traffic stop shootout
item.description: Authorities say a Texas man shot and wounded two deputies during a traffic stop before they returned fire and killed him.

item.title: Spike Lee’s 1st trip, Michael Jordan’s welcome to newcomers and more from basketball Hall of Fame
item.description: Spike Lee had a memorable first trip to the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame and Michael Jordan welcomed a couple newcomers to it.
